metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20216 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.31. A memory leak thatoccurs when decompression fails unexpectedly may lead to a denial ofservice. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to systemavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.24-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.24-1ubuntu0.1').
